comment 1: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. She is loving it so far! She said it warms the towels up very nicely and that they fit in their well. They love the look of it in the comfort of having a warm towel when it comes out, it was great value for the money and easy to use. - lbjsall
comment 2: This was a Christmas gift and I absolutely love it. Great design, Heat up extremely fast, and cools down quickly! - Linda B.
comment 3: I recently purchased this towel warmer and I couldn't be happier with my decision.I am impressed by its sleek and modern design,  looks great in my bathroom, and it feels sturdy and well-made.My towels are toasty warm and ready to use.Not only does it warm towels, but I’ve also used it to dry my delicates and even my bathrobe. It has enough space to hold multiple towels, which is great for my family.I was pleasantly surprised by how energy-efficient this towel warmer is. It doesn’t consume much electricity, which is a plus for my utility bills.It has truly transformed my bathroom experience. If you’re considering adding a towel warmer to your home, this one is definitely worth it! - Raquel
comment 4: I've had this towel warmer for 4 years now and it has worked great. Early on, the lid became separated, and I had to super glue it together, but then I didn't have any problems. (No, the glue did not melt when the towel warmer is on). The warmer shuts off after about 1 hr for safety and heats up quickly after that.Fast forward 4 years (ordered it in October 2021) and it is now turning on by itself (or staying on rather than auto shut off) and over-heating! I came into my bathroom the other night and it smelled like something was burning, and I see the towel warmer was on!? (We shower in the mornings. So, either it didn't auto-shut off and was on all day, or it turned on by itself) So, we have been unplugging it more regularly. However, when I do use it, it does not seem to be auto turning off and it gets too hot. It is the first time I've experienced this with this product and I'm thinking it's time to get a new one. I'm sad though, because this seems like a waste to throw in the landfill. However, it's no longer safe if we forget to unplug it and if the towels feel like they might burn you. Again, this only recently started happening after about 4 years. Otherwise I feel like it's worth it! I even bought one for my mom when we bought ours. Maybe I should check on hers!! 😬 - A. M
comment 5: Great product, it warms towels super fast and is sleek in the corner. The 1 hour auto shut off is a life saver. - Veronica
